title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: JQS Trail – Rifle, Colorado
content:
Photo submitted by Eric Grumling, “While waiting for new tires for my road bike I dusted off the mountain bike and got off the tarmac for a few hours on Saturday. Very much a fish out of water but still had fun.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy […]

author: Kristi Benedict
